official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to make available the Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin program pumping power to the Hilltop Irrigation District and the Gray Goose Irrigation District.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to make available the Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin program pumping power to the Hilltop Irrigation District and the Gray Goose Irrigation District, South Dakota.
